text: Can You Teach My Alligator Manners? is an American TV series for children. It's on Disney Channel. It was broadcast from June 21, 2008, until October 24, 2009. Reruns started on Disney Junior from February 14, 2011 in the United States. ==Synopsis== The series is about a young boy named Mikey and his pet green alligator named Al. Mikey's mother tells him that he cannot keep Al unless Al learns manners. Mikey gets the help of the people watching the series to teach Al manners in many different places. ==Voice cast== The actors for a show are: * Colin Ford (US), Corey Bearman-Worthington (UK) as Mikey Goldman * Rob Paulsen as Al the alligator Category:2008 television series debuts Category:2009 television series endings Category:2000s American children's television series Category:2000s American animated television series Category:Television series about animals Category:Disney Channel television series
title: Can You Teach My Alligator Manners?
